General.Name: Leejam Sports Company SJSC
General.Description: Leejam Sports Company operates sports and fitness centers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. It primarily operates 8 brands, including Fitness Time Plus, a fitness center for high-net-worth individuals; Fitness Time, a business class center; Fitness Time Pro, an economy class center for fitness professionals; Fitness Time Ladies Express; Fitness Time Ladies; Fitness Time Ladies Pro; Fitness Time Ladies Plus; and Fitness Time Express. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
